p: Dehaen et al. reported a novel library of fused 1,2,3-triazole derivatives against coronavirus 229E in HEL cells [85]. Structure-activity relationship studies showed that some compounds displayed moderate inhibitory activities in micromolar range without alterations of the normal cell morphology in confluent HEL cell cultures at concentrations up to 100 μM. For example, compounds 37- 41 (see Fig. 7 ). Although the authors claimed that these inhibitors could inhibit the 3CL protease of CoV-229E based on the molecular modeling of previously reported inhibitors, they could not confirm with the experiments.
